english.segment1: I wonder where you're at. Onto better things. And you want it now. I wonder if you'll ask. All the big machines. And I'm all done
english.segment2: Why do I ask?. Out of all the things. That I could be doing. How do I hide?. To waste my time
english.segment3: I wonder where you're at. You avoid these things. You want it now. You're something that you're not. And you'll never be. All that good to me. Always a new tad. All the things that we had, tonight. All I want to do is disappear in darkness. Forget you
english.segment4: Wandering from my eyes, I'm done. The shriveling of my skin makes you. Don't you think if I got too young. Then all of this would make us all done, done. Bye
english.segment5: You're something that you're not. And you'll never be. All that good to me. Always a new tad. That all the things that we had tonight. And all I want to do is disappear in darkness. Forget you
english.segment6: Wandering from my eyes, I'm done. The shriveling of my skin makes you. Don't you think if I got too young. Then all of this would make us all done, done. Bye
english.segment7: Bye bye, bye bye. I'm all done, with us, with us. And I say bye bye, bye bye. I'm all done with us, with us. (Don't you think if I got too young. Then all of this would make us all done, done)
